title: Felix is scared of bugs.. (collab with @PewDiePie )

comments.comment: Honestly seeing him grow from a man who would scream at barrels to now retired, making these relaxing vlogs and living his life with his wife and dogs is such a great thing to see. Thanks for continuing to make videos and helping me get through school, I wish you all the best.
Felix and PewDiePie is definitely the greatest duo and most anticipated collaboration of all time. The moment every one of us has been waiting for… has finally arrived!
It's so nice of PewDiePie helping small creators like Felix. So much respect
the way you look at Marzia and tell her shes beautiful/gorgeous melts my heart and makes me feel so lucky that you allow us to see moments like this.

I'm a Japanese who smiles at your Vlog.  I'm relieved that you seem to have survived the hot summer in Japan.  I can hardly understand English, but I like how you shoot and edit your videos, and the background music is very gentle.  There is a big traditional festival in my city on October 15th and 16th.  The festival is called the Kawagoe Festival (Kawagoe Matsuri).  It seems that 29 floats will appear this year.  It's very crowded, but I'd be happy if you could see it.
When Felix and PewDiePie collab, you know it’s gonna be good.
pewd's vlog is the best. it's so heart warming. it's so adorable that they'd share their anniversary celebration with us.

This feels like whenever you finish a video game and you get a post-credits scene of the main characters living their lives happily. 

Congrats on grinding so hard pewds I hope you're enjoying retirement to the max lol.

12:57 Marzia looks so happy and beautiful. It’s like the scene from a romance movie, with her looking back in a flowing dress with the sunset in the background. I absolutely love it. I’m so happy for both of you, thank you for sharing your adventures with us.
Loving this vlog content. That shot of Marzia running with the sunset happening in front of her was an absolute stunner
I still love Marzia’s editing so much️Their whole journey in Japan has been so amazing to watch
It's impossible to watch pewds channel without smiling nowadays. You guys are perfect for each other
Dude's just vibing and living his life, After watching him for close to a decade it feels weird but it also makes me happy seeing him have such a great time :)))

I feel like y'all are living a fairytale existence, and instead of being envious in any way, I am just so happy for the both of you.  It is somehow fulfilling for ME to see you both make it there and live the life you've dreamed of and worked so hard for years to achieve.  Keep doing you, bro.  Been around since amnesia and the barrels lol.  And oddly enough, even though you don't know me, never will, and won't ever even see this comment, I am proud of you.  Much love

After a long time of not watching pewds 

I come back to this 

Warms my heart how far he has gone
Finally, we get to witness the most anticipated collab in YouTube history.
i'm sick at home away from my friends but this vlog brightened my day, just the simple joy that you guys have in japan is amazing and lovely to watch.

I can’t believe I’ve been watching this guy for so long. I feel like any style of video he makes is so entertaining. From the gaming videos, to Pew News. To book reviews/philosophy to easy day vlog videos. I will probably watch him until he decides to stop.
It's been years since I've watched you again, Felix. I could definitely see and feel a new definition of radiance and happiness from you and Marzia. Well-deserved  Enjoy and stay safe always!

man, I absolutly love this vlogs with a special touch of Marzia. Sort of like my weekly therapy. I feels so happy that you both are living the best and most deserved life in Japan with your puggas.Thank you Felix and Marzia for these videos :3 a fan since 2012 and will stay with you both for as long as you both keep doing this
I was in such a crappy mood today, and then I came home and watched this. Cheered me right up. I just smile through every moment of these vlogs. Happy Anniversary you guys! xx
It was nice seeing PewDiePie in another video, can’t wait to see him in more!
These vlogs make me smile  even when I’m going thru my worst, just seeing you two happy and seeing all the places you guys go is so nice ️

felix , these vlogs are really better than any movie i have watched . they're honest , real but still provide a form of escapism away from the mundanity of life . you're really helping a lot of people connect and just be happy man . 
go well , traveler .

This is the Most. Awaited. Collab. Ever.
Felix is so humble yet so lucky to have PewDiePie collaborating with him.
With all these pewdievlogs, it's like a world where Marzia is the one editing it out. It's so calm.

I hope you live the rest of your life as happy as you are now Felix, I'm happy for you. I've been your fan since the old horror game videos and being there throughout your whole youtube career makes me happy to see that unlike other youtubers, you're living your best out there without a care about what happens in the internet.
Wow… This video made me truly realize how multilingual he’s becoming. From Swedish to Italian, and slowly becoming more fluent with his Japanese! Great work Pewds!

My wife and I also moved to Japan, and we plan to stay like Felix and Marzia. Our house is by a river lined with sakura trees, everything is so affordable, cities are clean and safe, no need for a car just bikes, and the food is delish. People are so nice here, it’s the perfect life.
i'll never get tired of showing my appreciation to felix. i'm very grateful he still takes us along even if he doesn't have to.
Legit my favorite content that Pewds has ever made. This is the golden era people!!
You can really tell Felix is so happy living there, Watching this channel from 2012 to now make this feel like an anime ending, Felix found his happy ending.
Pewdipie’s vlogs are so relaxed and entertaining, enjoyable and chill love his content!
God Marzia running towards that light was just GORGEOUS. You are such a lucky man, Felix. I know you know this. Happy Anni cuties

this videos make me so happy. i've been having trouble with anxiety and depression and these videos have helped me so much to distract myself and be comforted and happy. thank you pewds and marzia for helping people like me find comfort in your videos. thank you so much, you guys are amazing i cannot thank you enough.

i loved the open air museum, thanks for showing it! it felt as if i was there with you guys, it looked so cool. and thank you for showing us a bit of your anniversary celebration - that looked like such a magical place! happy anniversary <3 PS excellent music choice for the vlog Marzia!!
Nice to see Felix help out small content creators
i always love pewds blogs so much. he doesnt spend like crazy and hes always humble, the blog feels close to home, luv it, keep going man
When I'm stressed or feel anxiety coming in to me I always come back to Felix's vlogs. It just somehow helps me move on with life.
Can confirm as an Australian that Emma is right- during recess and lunch at my primary school we would hunt down the shells and pin them on our clothes. Dunno why, just seemed pretty cool
These japan vlogs boosts my whole mood everytime I watch it. Another great vlog !
I wish this paradise never stops. It's like my reality escape into a better one and seeing life through you gives me an immeasurable amount of joy! Love you and Marzia :)
marzia always wears the cutest outfits
When Felix was talking about the cicadas last time I was screaming 'The skins! We collect the skins!' Definitely an Australian thing.
Happy anniversary to you both!! Thanks for sharing bits of your life with us!
Felix single handedly saving the japanese tourism industry. Not all heros wear capes
you seem so happy! im so happy for you!

the one thing I sincerely appreciate about these vlogs is their keen ability to showcase the beauty in the seemingly mundane... like the vistas at the charging station... so simple but illustrate the sweetness of life
As an Australian i can confirm i do this, they're called Cicadas and they're also what's constantly screaming around you, some of them live underground for 27 years before emerging.

felix getting excited over the smallest things are the best parts of these videos <3 a crab samurai, people moving out of the way, a bag that can fit a bottle, ghibli soundtrack on the road and sunsets :’)
we love that you’re having such a great time in Japan so happy to see you happy Felix <3
So glad you went back to get more of the duck figuring collectables! Was really curious what the other variations would look like :) they're so cute!!
I was about to get suspicious that Felix and Pewdiepie are seemingly never in the same place at the same time  but then you two posted this epic collab

honestly just thank you for making videos still even after so much work you've already put into it. truly one of my favorite youtubers of all time. helping me when I was 15 thru high school and then now 23 years old and I feel like I've been growing up with you, every time looking forward to seeing your videos for a smile and wisdom. truly I'm so glad you exist, and I always go back your videos with Marzia  and I remember the good old days. I love you both and it makes me so happy that ya'll are happy and it's inspirational & motivating in every way, it's not easy and you have made the struggles look easy. congratulations on your anniversary! with love! <3
Your vlogs are the best part of my day felix, Love the marzia editing style.

Happy anniversary! It feels SO WEIRD having watched you two since 2011/2012. Thank you for sharing your life journey with us, it's been inspiring to have watched your love grow and flourish over the years. Here's to many more amazing years, you guys deserve it <3

growing up seeing pood’s and marzia’s relationship gave me such a good example of a healthy partnership growing up (when i never saw it at home or in the media). it’s so nice to see how every single vlog they’re still such a sweet couple after all these years :,))

Marzia is so sweet with the cutest outfits. so mysterious in her whimsy like a fairy lady   
you guys are literally a modern ghibli couple
I always look forward to these. It's great to watching something so calming after a stressful day. :)
5:28 This lizard is a species unique to Japan, and there is a theory that by conspicuously displaying its tail, it escapes danger from enemies. I caught a lot of them when I was little.

Finally the long awaited collab we’ve been waiting for 

Felix and PewDiePie

Hi Marzia & Felix, Wonderful editing and the flower shop earlier on reminded me of Howles Moving Castle for some reason. I kept expecting to see Sophie's hat shop. I love the Gibliesque architecture and hope to design a weird-shaped house like that one day.
great to see fliex give shout out to smaller creators like PewDiePie
Best Collaboration ever!! More Love to PewDiePie and his Family ️
12:03 "i love your brain" crying brb
That old Japan architecture was really awesome to see. Always cool to see old buildings like that.

8:02 Kodakarayu  is one of the models of Spirited Away. In addition, there are several buildings in the Edo-Tokyo Open Air Architectural Museum that were used as models for Spirited Away. The Edo-Tokyo Open Air Architectural Museum is a wonderful place where you can feel the old Japan. I definitely want you to go there
Legitimately made me shed a tear for you two, I am so proud of you guys and this life you are living, if I can achieve 10% of what you have I'd die a happy man.
These vlogs of Marzia and Felix together are unmatched. So wholesome and they look very happy

Happy Anniversary! I just wanna say thank you for bringing us along, you could have easily done this off camera. Ive been going through a really hard time and your videos have really cheered me up. You two look so happy, and that makes me happy too.
i absolutly LOVE these vlogs. ive wanted to visit japan for a long time now and you are just showing us more of how beautiful it is there <3
The best duo on YouTube today Felix and PewDiePie. It's always great to get a different vlog of japan and new experiences they've found

Like everyone else, I just want to say thank you for sharing all of this with us. It's such a privilege to be taken along in your adventures and day to day life, and it's so relaxing! Seeing you both (and the pugs) so happy is the best cure for any bad day!
the vibes felixs videos bring are so calming its un explainable
12:58 an angel
I really love the vlogs from Japan, feels like we're visiting Japan with you. I hope I can go there one day too.
He's not just a youtuber, he's a great MULTI TALENT
these vlogs are very comforting, and i feel happy just seeing you guys enjoy your stay

I have been watching videos from your channel for almost a decade already. I was like here since cat mario stuff and fridays with pewdiepie, I wish you all the best felix. And boy, your vlogs are the best (with touch of marzia as part your vlogs). We can't ask for more, please enjoy every moment, you both deserve it!
Now that you have worn a cicada skin, you are officially Australian! 🇦🇺
I haven’t watched pewdiepie in so long. It’s nice to see him enjoy “retirement” and just enjoy life out of the spotlight.
This is probably the greatest series videos Pewds ever uploaded.
i feel so good and comfortable to watch your vlogs idk how to describe it, but when i come home after a hard day of work, these vlogs are healing me :)))
This is by far the most wholesome vlog of all.

I really love these bloats, they’re so sweet and happy. Gives me a boost of serotonin, and I used to collect the cicada shells too when I would visit my grandparents in Texas.  sending love and light anyone who needs it.
Such an amazing collab! Hope you do more of these in the future!

I almost always end up tearing up a bit at the vlogs, I am someone that has always had a deep appreciation for Japan and never got to go. No I have too many health issues to travel so seeing these always makes my day.
The place they stayed is called Sekizenkan located in Shima Onsen area in Gunma prefecture. I had a chance to stay there with my family too and it was one of the best experience I had.
Felix living his best life.
i love you felix your content has gotten me through some rough times and i really appreciate you. keep up the amazing work and i wish you the best

I love watching the vlogs because the pugs are just so cute! And also I like seeing how people live and travel in Japan. My best friend and I want to visit and coke back with just a bag full of gundams and plushies
These Vlogs are my new favorite series on youtube. I absolutely love watching these. It feels real and refreshing! Thank you for making them! I hope to see more if you're still up to making them!
Great video Felix. Love all the collabs you do with smaller creators like PewDiePie

I’m happy and at peace how one of my favorite YouTuber, who climbed to the top of the world and headed down to finally settle down the place he always dreamed of and doing all the activities he’s never done before, this is truly the happiness I hope to come to my life one day and meet my hero and motivator
you two are so cute i wish i can find a man like felix someday!
Finally we got the collaboration we all wanted and needed!

Thanks for all the fun videos!
Glad you enjoyed Japan and shared it with us!
The collaboration we didn't know we needed, Felix x pewdiepie is the best collab ever
When I watch your vlogs it really doesn't feel like i'm watching a super-popular youtuber with a fanbase of 100 million, but a small youtuber who just records his daily life living in Japan.
Literally always watch these videos with a smile on my face. Thanks Felix!
This proves pewdiepie AND FELIX is super relatable To people who are scared of bugs
Man, a beautiful couple living in a beautiful country! Such nice content and to also witness this rare collab is just the perfect combination
I would LOVE this, it's like being able to snoop around people's houses in a ghost town or after a zombie apocalypse or something haha
I love these videos, man. Positive vibes all around, and fantastic editing as always Marzia!
Ah I love knowing where pewds came from and what he built and now he can relax and enjoy his life with his wife this is the goal in life man.
I'm so happy seeing you and Marzia enjoying Japan️ I keep wishing someday I'll walk into the two of you in Tokyo! Sending lots of love to you both! (from Tokyo)
These vlogs are getting better and better and the ketchup thingy was so cute , I love Marzia's style and her editing is the best !!!
Finally, a collab between Felix and Pewdiepie! I’ve been waiting for this day!
You guys look so happy! I'm loving your vlogs, they're so calming

Legendary Collaboration 
I love PewDiePie, but Felix is still better
I actually really like the vlogs I think after the years I’ve matured a lot and now enjoy this more mature content thank you pewdz
Man Felix is such a nice man, I wish pewdiepie collaborates with him more
Hope the collab with Felix and Pewds continues. They have so much chemistry together!
Im glad to see Felix and Pewdiepie finally getting along! Love the collabs
Watching these feels like a epilogue to a long series, Felix really riding off into the sunset

I like how despite calling it gross, he doesn't just yeet it but instead gently place it on top of a wooden pole.
(P.S We also "wear" them often as kids back in the day here in my homeland)
15:09 Grand Seiko Hi-Beat 36000 Soko Edition SBGH295
Hes living my dream :), just glad he’s showing it
I love to see Felix enjoy life, he's living a good life and thats enough to make me happy
